sentences.sContent: The lumbering, Luddite world of automobiles has a special attraction for Silicon Valley entrepreneurs.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lumbering, Luddite world of automobiles has a special attraction for Silicon Valley entrepreneurs.
sentences.sCn: 笨拙守旧的汽车业一向对硅谷企业家们有着特殊的诱惑。

sentences.sContent: But I also knew how common it was for these lumbering giants to be gashed by boat propellers or entangled in crab traps.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I also knew how common it was for these lumbering giants to be gashed by boat propellers or entangled in crab traps.
sentences.sCn: 但我也知道，它们这些笨拙的海洋生物经常被船的螺旋桨划伤，或卷入捕蟹器中。

sentences.sContent: Attacked at home last week by a 90kg black bear, she sent it lumbering back into the night simply by throwing a courgette at it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Attacked at home last week by a 90kg black bear, she sent it lumbering back into the night simply by throwing a courgette at it.
sentences.sCn: 当上周她在家中被一只90公斤的黑熊攻击时，她迅速向黑暗中缓慢移动的黑熊投去一只小胡瓜。

words.tran: 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声
伐木工人；木材商的佣工；短茄克衫
伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动
